issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://en.yify.guide/movies](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fen.yify.guide%2Fmovies) ### Comment > Hi, every time I refresh the page or open the page, that little advertisement in the bottom left keeps popping out.
